properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 4:20AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville affecting Troup County

Line Creek near Senoia affecting Coweta...Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville.
* Until further notice.
* At 3 AM Wednesday the stage was 8.7 feet...and
steady.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Flood stage is 8 feet.
* At 8 feet...Minor flooding begins of the marshy wetlands and
woods along the creek upstream and downstream from the stream gage
on the Hammett Road bridge.
* This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.6 feet on Dec 31 2015.
